# proxy-server

This solution is a simple proxy server that logs the headers of all HTTP request it forwards.

Tecnhologies used:

- Spring boot
- Maven
- Lombok
- Netflix - Zuul

At the root of the project, run the following commands to validate the correct operation of the implemented solution.

- mvn clean install
- mvn spring-boot:run

curl --location --request GET 'http://localhost:8083/proxy-server/users' \
--header 'Correlation-Id: 9561891asdf619841asdf984' \
